    • Field Detail

      • FILE_PATH_LIMIT

        public static final int FILE_PATH_LIMIT
        If multiple paths are specified on the command line, this limit is used to split paths into chunks. The limit is less than OS limit to leave space to quoting, spaces, charset conversion, and commands arguments.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

        public VcsFileUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • foreachChunk

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> foreachChunk(java.util.List<java.lang.String> arguments,
                                                 int groupSize,
                                                 ThrowableNotNullFunction<? super java.util.List<java.lang.String>,? extends java.util.List<? extends T>,? extends VcsException> processor)
                                          throws VcsException
        Execute function for each chunk of arguments and collect the result. Check for being cancelled in process.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of result value
        Parameters:
        arguments - the arguments to chunk
        groupSize - size of argument groups that should be put in the same chunk (like a name and a value)
        processor - function to execute on each chunk
        Returns:
        list of result values
        Throws:
        VcsException

      • foreachChunk

        public static void foreachChunk(java.util.List<java.lang.String> arguments,
                                int groupSize,
                                ThrowableConsumer<? super java.util.List<java.lang.String>,? extends VcsException> consumer)
                         throws VcsException
        Execute function for each chunk of arguments. Check for being cancelled in process.
        Parameters:
        arguments - the arguments to chunk
        groupSize - size of argument groups that should be put in the same chunk (like a name and a value)
        consumer - consumer to feed each chunk
        Throws:
        VcsException

      • chunkArguments

                                                                              int groupSize)
        Chunk arguments on the command line
        Parameters:
        arguments - the arguments to chunk, number of arguments should be divisible by groupSize
        groupSize - size of argument groups that should be put in the same chunk
        Returns:
        a list of lists of arguments

      • addFilesToVcsWithConfirmation

        public static void addFilesToVcsWithConfirmation(Project project,
                                                 VirtualFile... virtualFiles)

      • addFilesToVcsWithConfirmation

        public static void addFilesToVcsWithConfirmation(Project project,
                                                 java.util.Collection<? extends VirtualFile> virtualFiles)
        Finds all VCSs related to the passed files, suggests user to add files to the respected VCSs honoring addition and silence settings and adds them if user or settings confirmed addition. Because of potentially long operation of collecting files it's highly recommended to invoke it on the pooled thread. Method works synchronously.
        Parameters:
        project - project we work in
        virtualFiles - collection of virtual files to add; directories being added recursively

      • unescapeGitPath

        public static java.lang.String unescapeGitPath(java.lang.String path,
                                               java.lang.String encoding)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Unescape path returned by Git.

        If there are quotes in the file name, Git not only escapes them, but also encloses the file name into quotes: "\"quote"

        If there are spaces in the file name, Git displays the name as is, without escaping spaces and without enclosing name in quotes.

        Parameters:
        path - a path to unescape
        encoding - to use while converting char octets
        Returns:
        unescaped path ready to be searched in the VFS or file system.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is invalid

      • unescapeGitPath

        public static java.lang.String unescapeGitPath(java.lang.String path)
